epic-1---loan-application-portal.title: Epic 1 - Loan Application Portal
epic-1---loan-application-portal.description: Develop a customer-facing portal to allow applicants to submit loan requests, upload documents, and track application status.

US001.title: User Story 1 - Loan Application Form
US001.description: As a customer, I want to complete and submit a loan application form online so that I can apply for a loan without visiting the bank.
US001.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Web-based Loan Application Portal for customers

T001.title: Task 1 - Design Loan Application Form UI & Submission Logic
T001.description: Create responsive and accessible web forms for personal and home loans, including basic validation and mock submission logic.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Form fields align with loan requirements.
Validation is applied to all mandatory fields.
Supports both personal and home loan types (mock selection).
Confirmation message displayed upon successful submission.

US002.title: User Story 2 - Application Status Tracking
US002.description: As a customer, I want to track my loan application status so that I stay informed throughout the process.

T002.title: Task 1 - Build Status Tracker Component
T002.description: Create UI component to display real-time application progress, dynamically updating via mock backend API.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Displays status: Submitted, Under Review, Approved, or Rejected.
Updates dynamically via mock backend API.

epic-2---automated-document-verification.title: Epic 2 - Automated Document Verification
epic-2---automated-document-verification.description: Automate document verification using OCR to reduce manual processing time and improve accuracy.
epic-2---automated-document-verification.relatedPRDSection: High-Level Deliverables: 3. Automated Document Verification Service

US003.title: User Story 1 - Document Upload & OCR Processing
US003.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically verify my uploaded documents so that I don't have to manually validate them.
US003.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Integration with: Document OCR service

T003.title: Task 1 - Integrate OCR API & Handle Failures
T003.description: Develop a component for uploading documents, simulating OCR processing, and handling verification failures with mock notifications.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: OCR API successfully extracts text from uploaded documents (mock).
Verification status returned and stored in system (mock).
System flags failed verifications for manual review (mock).
Users receive notification for re-upload if required (mock).

epic-3---credit-check-integration.title: Epic 3 - Credit Check Integration
epic-3---credit-check-integration.description: Connect with external credit bureaus to assess applicant creditworthiness automatically.
epic-3---credit-check-integration.relatedPRDSection: High-Level Deliverables: 4. Credit Check Integration Module

US004.title: User Story 1 - Credit Bureau Integration & Display
US004.description: As a loan officer, I want the system to automatically fetch credit scores from the Credit Bureau API and display them in the dashboard so that I can make informed approval decisions.
US004.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Integration with: Credit Bureau API

T004.title: Task 1 - Implement Credit Bureau API Integration & Display
T004.description: Simulate fetching credit scores from a Credit Bureau API and display the mock data within an application detail view.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Credit score fetched successfully for each applicant (mock).
API error handling implemented for unavailability (mock).
Credit score visible in application details view (mock).
System logs each API request for compliance (mock message).

epic-4---notifications-and-reporting.title: Epic 4 - Notifications and Reporting
epic-4---notifications-and-reporting.description: Develop automated notifications and reporting capabilities for both customers and administrators.

US005.title: User Story 1 - Notification System
US005.description: As a user, I want to receive automated notifications about my loan status so that I stay updated without manual follow-ups.
US005.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Automated Notifications and Reminders via email and SMS

T005.title: Task 1 - Integrate Email & SMS Services
T005.description: Implement a mock UI to simulate sending email and SMS notifications when a loan status changes.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Notifications sent when loan status changes (mock trigger).
SMS and email templates are customizable (mock content display).

US006.title: User Story 2 - Reporting Dashboard
US006.description: As an administrator, I want a reporting dashboard to analyze loan application trends and system performance.
US006.relatedPRDSection: Project Scope: Basic Reporting and Analytics dashboard

T006.title: Task 1 - Build Reporting Dashboard UI
T006.description: Create an analytics dashboard with mock charts and KPIs (total applications, approvals, rejections).

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Displays total applications, approvals, and rejections.
Reports exportable as PDF or CSV (mock button/message).
